short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and download all images in bulk from any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can extract all the images from a webpage and select all the images that you want to download. You can also download all the images in bulk from the webpage.
